title: FlipBuilder Flip PDF Pro 2.4.1 incl Patch - Crackingpatching

[b]Description:[/b]
PDF the Flip  - is an interesting program that will make the conversion of any document in PDF format in a beautiful booklet with support for page turning effect, plus the action is accompanied by a characteristic sound. If you are interested in not just read the document and you want to achieve the effect of watching magazine or a book, then this program will allow you to do this, download Flip PDF for free, you can the full news.
Please note that the creation of a document is not limited, you can publish your magazine directly on the website, there is support for sending it via e-mail or download to mobile devices. To get started, you have to do a small, specify the file with the document, choose the quality, wait for completion of the conversion, to enjoy the result. Agree, this is a small requirement plus there is Russian support, which means working with the program will be even easier, but initially there are no complications.
It should be noted that the developments on this issue a lot, on our site you can find more even, however, as we are assured developers, you still should choose Flip PDF, though, because the program has a large number of ready-made templates, styles and backgrounds, all this you can download your book for its decoration. In addition, in the book you can add different elements, such as a banner, there are plugins rotation of images, musical themes, you can download videos from YouTube, add animated pictures and so on. In total you will be able to take advantage of more than 400 styles, 200 images and 700 backgrounds. You expect a lot of layouts, buttons, patterns ...
If you want to still learn more about this wonderful program, you can go to the official website, and read there, certainly more information, I just tried to explain the main features of Flip PDF, and I hope I was able to do. To summarize, we note that the program is really good, easy interface, Russian support, a variety of templates, fast processing, all this leaves a positive impression, and I hope you too, thank you for your attention and good luck!

License : ShareWare 
language : English + Russian 
OS : Windows

[b]How to Install:[/b]
1- Run "flip-pdf-pro.exe" and install it
2- Use "Patch.exe" to register it
3- That's all. Enjoy full version
